alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County - Quinn (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 16 at 2:10PM PDT until July 17 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 437... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 437 Humboldt County-Quinn. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
